languages.text: "Пора завершить схизму. Пусть истребят последних отступников, уверовавших в учение Амарната, и очистят флот!"
"It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down every last renegade who follows the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"
languages.original_text: "Пора завершить схизму. Пусть истребят последних отступников, уверовавших в учение Амарната, и очистят флот!"

traits.locale_text: "It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down the last renegades who follow the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"
"It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down the last renegades who follow the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"
"It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down every last renegade who follows the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"
"It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down every last renegade who follows the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"
"It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down every last renegade who follows the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"

languages.text: “是时候结束这场分裂了。让他们追捕所有信奉阿玛纳特教义的信徒，彻底清洗舰队内的异端分子！”
languages.original_text: "It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down every last renegade who follows the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"

traits.locale_text: “是时候结束这场分裂了。让他们追捕所有信奉阿玛纳特教义的信徒，彻底清洗舰队内的异端分子！”

languages.text: « Il est temps de mettre fin au schisme. Qu'ils traquent les renégats fidèles aux enseignements d'Amarnat jusqu'au dernier et purifient la Flotte ! »
languages.original_text: "It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down every last renegade who follows the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"

traits.locale_text: « Il est temps de mettre fin au schisme. Qu'ils traquent les renégats fidèles aux enseignements d'Amarnat jusqu'au dernier et purifient la Flotte ! »

languages.text: «Ha llegado la hora de poner fin al cisma. ¡Déjeles que atrapen a todos los disidentes que sigan los preceptos de Amarnat y limpien esa flota de toda impureza!».
languages.original_text: "It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down every last renegade who follows the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"

traits.locale_text: «Ha llegado la hora de poner fin al cisma. ¡Déjeles que atrapen a todos los disidentes que sigan los preceptos de Amarnat y limpien esa flota de toda impureza!».

languages.text: 「分裂を終わらせる時だ。アマルナトの教えに従う反逆者を一人残らず狩り出し、艦隊を浄化するのだ！」
languages.original_text: "It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down every last renegade who follows the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"

traits.locale_text: 「分裂を終わらせる時だ。アマルナトの教えに従う反逆者を一人残らず狩り出し、艦隊を浄化するのだ！」

languages.text: "Es wird Zeit, die Spaltung zu beenden. Sie sollen jeden einzelnen Abtrünnigen jagen, der den Lehren des Amarnat folgt, und die Flotte reinigen!"
languages.original_text: "It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down every last renegade who follows the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"

traits.locale_text: "Es wird Zeit, die Spaltung zu beenden. Sie sollen jeden einzelnen Abtrünnigen jagen, der den Lehren des Amarnat folgt, und die Flotte reinigen!"

languages.text: "Bölünmeyi bitirme vakti geldi. Amarnat'ın öğretilerine iman eden asileri avlayıp filoyu arındırsınlar!"
languages.original_text: "It is time to end the schism. Let them hunt down every last renegade who follows the teachings of Amarnat and cleanse the fleet!"
